Thu 30 Oct - Tue 4 Nov
Bugonia
Dir. Yorgos Lanthimos
FIND OUT MORE

Bugonia

Dir. Yorgos Lanthimos
Fanomenon - FANORAMA
Thu 30 Oct - Tue 4 Nov
  • Canada
  • South Korea
  • UK
  • USA
  • Ireland
  • Europe
  • British Films
  • Thriller
  • Sci-Fi

Tue 4 Nov

  • Tue 4 Nov

    Audio Description
    Vue in the Light, Leeds
    Screen 7
    Tickets

The latest, much-anticipated collaboration between Yorgos Lanthimos and Emma Stone after Poor Things and Kinds of Kindness, Bugonia is a remake of cult Korean sci-fi comedy Save the Green Planet (2003).

An obsessive conspiracy theorist (Jesse Plemons) and his cousin (Aidan Delbis) kidnap the high-powered CEO of a major pharma company (Emma Stone). They are convinced that she is part of an alien species involved in conducting experiments on humans and is intent on destroying Earth.

Contains flashing lights and imagery. 

"Yorgos Lanthimos’s damning, bonkers indictment of our fractured times... unearths new depths of existential anxiety engendered by the increasingly tumultuous 2020s." — Rocco T Thompson, Slant Magazine

Content Guidance


Contains strong violence, injury detail, suicide, very strong language.

Director Yorgos Lanthimos
Running time 120 mins
Production year 2025
Country Ireland, UK, USA, South Korea, Canada
Language English
Courtesy of Universal
Certificate BBFC 15

Cookies

We use cookies and similar techniques to analyze the use of the website, to make it possible to display third-party content such as videos, and for various other applications. These cookies are also placed by third parties. More information…

Functional cookies

These are necessary for the website to function properly. This way your shopping cart will be remembered and you can log in on the website with your account.

Minimal cookies

This option allows cookies to enrich your experience on the website. For example, media from third parties such as videos. We also keep statistics to continuously improve the site.

All cookies

With these cookies we collect further information to carry out our marketing activities, such as newsletters and advertisements, in the most efficient and personal way.
